DOC.HEADLINE: ' CARLOS THE JACKAL ' REPORTEDLY ARRESTED DURING LIPOSUCTION
DOC.TEXT: " Carlos the Jackal " was arrested while undergoing liposuction to remove fat from around his waist , the Observer reported . The British Sunday newspaper quoted a Sudanese doctor in Cairo as saying Carlos had been admitted to a private hospital in Khartoum and that French agents seized him after he was rendered unconscious by anesthesia . Liposuction is a common cosmetic operation in which doctors vacuum fat out from under the skin . Carlos was arrested last week in Sudan and extradited to France to stand trial for attacks authorities allege he carried_out during his guerrilla campaigns of the 1970s and ' 80s .
